byline.contributor: Daniel E. Slotnik and Peter Keepnews contributed reporting.

abstract: Leonard Nimoy, actor known world over for his portrayal of Mr Spock on television and movie franchise Star Trek, dies at age 83; Nimoy had range of artistic pursuits, including poetry, photography and music in addition to his acting.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Nimoy won a worshipful global following as Mr. Spock, the resolutely logical human-Vulcan first officer in the television and movie juggernaut “Star Trek.”

headline.main: Leonard Nimoy, Spock of ‘Star Trek,’ Dies at 83
headline.print_headline: Leonard Nimoy, 83, Who Explored Worlds Beyond Spock, Dies

snippet: Mr. Nimoy won a worshipful global following as Mr. Spock, the resolutely logical human-Vulcan first officer in the television and movie juggernaut “Star Trek.”
